gov.nasa.ial.mde.solver.classifier
Class MDEClassifier

java.lang.Object
  gov.nasa.ial.mde.solver.classifier.MDEClassifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
PolarClassifier, PolynomialClassifier, QuadraticClassifier
public class MDEClassifier
extends Object

A parent class for all MDE classifiers. These classes resolve various types of equations into cannonical forms and perform other analyses.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dr. Robert Shelton
